title: Summer ‘fruit’ salad with raspberry vinaigrette
ingredients: ['1 packet mixed salad leaves', '1 mango, diced', '1 packet blackberries', '75g raspberries', '100g watermelon', '100g pineapple', 'For the vinaigrette', '25g raspberries', '6 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '1 pinch salt']
